portfolio.name: MyStore
portfolio.title: An e-commerce website built with AngularJS featuring a product list, product details, shopping cart, checkout form, and order confirmation page. Part of the Full-Stack Javascript developer nanodegree with Udacity.

portfolio.name: BookTracker
portfolio.title: A REST API for tracking books you're currently reading, built with Python and FastAPI. Features user management, Docker integration, and focuses on performance and security best practices.

portfolio.name: Quillz
portfolio.title: A quiz platform that allows users to create game-based or standard quizzes with engagement activities for teaching. Built with Laravel for a deep dive into back-end development.

portfolio.name: Business Finder
portfolio.title: A platform connecting businessmen to showcase ideas and investors to discover potential businesses. Developed as a group project with Trello for efficient project management.

portfolio.name: RatedTV
portfolio.title: A movie discovery app where users can find movies by genre, view descriptions, banners, IMDB ratings, and user comments. Built with PHP for the back-end.

portfolio.name: Caffena
portfolio.title: One of my first web projects, a cafe website created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with Bootstrap and animation libraries. My start into front-end web development.
